data.text: Sulemani xa taali ndee nan ya, Yuda Mangɛ Xesekiya naxee sɛbɛ:
Ala fee nɔxunma, mangɛe katama e fahaamude.
Koore xa maiteya nun bɔxi xa tilinyi mu kolonma.
Xa gbeti gbi ba, a nɔma findide se tofanyi ra.
Xa mixi ɲaaxi ba mangɛ rabilinyi,
I naxa i yɛtɛ igbo mangɛ ya xɔri,
A fisa kuntigi nan xa i xili i xa dɔxɔ yire nde,
I na fe nde to, i naxa gbata sigafe ra kiiti banxi,
Fe na so wo nun i dɔxɔboore tagi,
xa na mu a ra mixi nde na na kolon,
Wɔyɛnyi falaxi a ki ma,
Xaxilima xa marasi tide gbo xaxili fenyi bɛ,
Dugutɛgɛ xɛɛra ɲɔxun a xɛɛma bɛ,
Mixi naxan a falama a setaree kima, kɔnɔ a mu a rabama,
Tunnabɛxiya a niyama nɛ mangɛ xa natɛ masara,
I na kumi to, naxan i ralima, na nan kɔn.
I naxa i dɔxɔboore xɔnyi sigafe radigan,
I dɔxɔboore tɔɔɲɛgɛfe xɔnɔ
I xaxili tife yanfante ra, na luxi nɛ
Mixi naxan sigi sama mixi sunnunxi ya xɔri,
Xa kaamɛ na i yaxui ma, donse so a yi ra.
Xa i na wali mɔɔli raba a bɛ,
Foye naxan kelima kɔɔla ma,
Lufe ra banxi fari ma,
Xibaaru fanyi naxan kelixi yire makuye,
Tinxintɔɛ naxan natɛ tongoma,
Kumi donfe a radangi a i, na mu fan.
Mixi naxan mu nɔma a yɛtɛ raxande a na xɔnɔ,
